description: Dylan didn't take much persuading to do his first video. That's because his girlfriend set up the shoot for him. If you watch his bio clips, you'll find out that his girlfriend is a stripper and wanted him to get into the 'business' too.  Actually, she came along with him to the shoot as well.  It was definitely the first time a guy brought along his personal fluffer with him!If you like tattoos, you'll be in love with this guy as he has some great artwork on his body.  He has one on his chest, which is a little bigger then I like personally, but he has a great body and the most perfect cock that I didn't mind at all.Dylan was a lot of fun to work with and he said that he definitely wants to do this some more. I can't wait to work with him again, just next time....leave the girlfriend at home!
title: The Hockey Jockey, Scene #02
